post.title: wile
post.body:
**vt** to want, need, wish, have to, must, will, should
**n** desire, need, will
**mod** necessary

post.title: weka
post.body:
**mod** away, absent, missing
**n** absence
**vt** throw away, remove, get rid of

post.title: wawa
post.body:
**n** energy, strength, power
**mod** energetic, strong, fierce, intense, sure, confident
**vt** strengthen, energize, empower

post.title: waso
post.body: **n** bird, winged animal

post.title: wan
post.body:
**mod** one, a
**n** unit, element, particle, part, piece
**vt** unite, make one
[one]

post.title: walo
post.body:
**mod** white, light (colour)
**n** white thing or part, whiteness, lightness
[sounds like wall, which is often white]

post.title: utala
post.body:
**n** conflict, disharmony, competition, fight, war, battle, attack, blow, argument, physical or verbal violence
**vt** hit, strike, attack, compete against

post.title: uta
post.body:
**n** mouth
**mod** oral

post.title: unpa
post.body:
**n** sex, sexuality
**mod** erotic, sexual
**vt** have sex with, sleep with, fuck
**vi** have sex

post.title: tu
post.body:
**mod** two
**n** duo, pair
**vt** double, separate/cut/divide in two
[two]

post.title: tomi
post.body:
**n** indoor constructed space, e.g. house, home, room, building
**mod** urban, domestic, household

post.title: toki
post.body:
**n** language, talking, speech, communication
**mod** talking, verbal
**vt** say
**vi** talk, chat, communicate
**interj** hello! hi!

post.title: tenpo
post.body: **n** time, period of time, moment, duration, situation

post.title: telo
post.body:
**n** water, liquid, juice, sauce
**vt** water, wash with water

post.title: tawa
post.body:
**prep** to, in order to, towards, for, until
**vi** go to, walk, travel, move, leave
**n** movement, transportation
**mod** moving, mobile
**vt** move, displace
[towards]

post.title: taso
post.body:
**mod** only, sole
**conj** but
[that's all]

post.title: tan
post.body:
**prep** from, by, because of, since
**n** origin, cause

post.title: suwi
post.body:
**n** candy, sweet food
**mod** sweet, cute
**vt** sweeten
[sweet]

post.title: supa
post.body: **n** horizontal surface, e.g furniture, table, chair, pillow, floor

post.title: suno
post.body: **n** sun, light

post.title: suli
post.body:
**mod** big, tall, long, adult, important
**vt** enlarge, lengthen
**n** size

post.title: soweli
post.body: **n** animal, especially land mammal, lovable animal

post.title: sona
post.body:
**n** knowledge, wisdom, intelligence, understanding
**vt** know, understand, know how to
**vi** know, understand

post.title: sitelen
post.body:
**n** picture, image

post.body: **n** front, chest, torso, face, wall

post.body:

post.title: sin
post.body:

post.body:
**n** circle, wheel, sphere, ball, cycle
**mod** round, cyclical

post.body: **n** body, physical state

post.body:
**n** high, up, above, top, over, on
**mod** superior, elevated, religious, formal

post.title: seme
post.body: **oth** what, which, wh- (question word)

post.title: selo
post.body: **n** outside, surface, skin, shell, bark, shape, peel

post.title: seli
post.body:

post.title: sama
post.body:
**mod** same, similar, equal, of equal status or position
**prep** like, as, seem

post.title: pu
post.body: **mod** interacting with the official toki pona book

post.title: pona
post.body:
**n** good, simplicity, positivity
**mod** good, simple, positive, nice, correct, right
**interj** great! good! thanks! OK! cool! yay!
**vt** improve, fix, repair, make good
[bonam]

post.title: poki
post.body:
**n** container, box, bowl, cup, glass
[box]

post.title: poka
post.body:
**n** side, hip, next to
**prep** in the accompaniment of, with
**mod** neighbouring

post.title: pipi
post.body: **n** bug, insect, spider

post.title: pini
post.body:
**n** end, tip
**mod** completed, finished, past, done, ago
**vt** finish, close, end, turn off

post.title: pimeja
post.body:
**mod** black, dark
**n** darkness, shadows
**vt** darken

post.title: pilin
post.body:
**n** feelings, emotion, heart
**vi** feel
**vt** feel, think, sense, touch
[feeling]

post.title: pi
post.body: **sep** of, belonging to

post.title: pana
post.body:
**vt** give, put, send, place, release, emit, cause
**n** giving, transfer, exchange

post.title: pan
post.body: **n** grain, cereal

post.title: palisa
post.body: **n** long, mostly hard object, e.g. rod, stick, branch

post.title: pali
post.body:
**n** activity, work, deed, project
**mod** active, work-related, operating, working
**vt** do, make, build, create
**vi** act, work, function

post.title: pakala
post.body:
**n** blunder, accident, mistake, destruction, damage, breaking
**vt** screw up, fuck up, botch, ruin, break, hurt, injure, damage, spoil, ruin
**vi** screw up, fall apart, break
**interj** damn! fuck!

post.title: open
post.body: **vt** open, turn on

post.title: ona
post.body:
**n** she, he, it, they
**mod** her, his, its, their

post.title: olin
post.body:
**n** love
**mod** love
**vt** to love (somebody or something)

post.title: oko
post.body:
**n** eye
[similar to oculist]

post.title: o
post.body:
**sep** O (vocative or imperative)
**interj** hey! (calling somebody's attention)

post.title: noka
post.body: **n** leg, foot

post.title: nimi
post.body: **n** word, name

post.title: ni
post.body: **mod** this, that

post.title: nena
post.body: **n** bump, nose, hill, mountain, button

post.title: nasin
post.body: **n** way, manner, custom, road, path, doctrine, system, method

post.title: nasa
post.body:
**mod** silly, crazy, foolish, drunk, strange, stupid, weird
**vt** drive crazy, make weird

post.title: nanpa
post.body:
**n** number
oth -th (ordinal numbers)
[number]

post.title: namako
post.body:
**n** food additive, accessory, something extra
**vt** season, embellish, stimulate

post.title: mute
post.body:
**mod** many, very, much, several, a lot, abundant, numerous, more
**n** amount, quantity
**vt** make many or much
[multi]

post.title: musi
post.body:
**n** fun, playing, game, recreation, art, entertainment
**mod** artful, fun, recreational
**vi** play, have fun
**vt** amuse, entertain

post.title: mun
post.body:
**n** moon
**mod** lunar
[moon]

post.title: mu
post.body:
**interj** woof! meow! moo! etc. (cute animal noise)
[moo]

post.title: monsi
post.body:
**n** back, rear end, butt, behind
**mod** back, rear

post.title: moku
post.body:
**n** food, meal
**vt** eat, drink, swallow, ingest, consume

post.title: mije
post.body:
**n** man, male, boy, husband, boyfriend
**mod** male, masculine, manly

post.title: mi
post.body:
**n** I, we
**mod** my, our
[me]

post.title: meli
post.body:
**n** woman, female, girl, wife, girlfriend
**mod** female, feminine, womanly
[Mary]

post.title: mani
post.body:
**n** money, material wealth, currency, dollar, capital
[money]

post.title: mama
post.body:
**n** parent, mother, father
**mod** of the parent, parental, maternal, fatherly
[sounds like momma]

post.title: ma
post.body: **n** land, earth, country, (outdoor) area

post.title: lupa
post.body:
**n** hole, orifice, window, door
[sounds like loop]

post.title: lukin
post.body:
**vt** see, look at, watch, read
**vi** look, watch out, pay attention
**mod** visual(ly)
[looking]

post.title: luka
post.body: **n** hand, arm

post.title: lon
post.body:
**prep** be (located) in/at/on
**vi** be there, be present, be real/true, exist, be awake

post.title: loje
post.body: **mod** red

post.title: lipu
post.body: **n** flat and bendable thing, e.g. paper, card, ticket

post.title: linja
post.body:
**n** long, very thin, floppy thing, e.g. string, rope, hair, thread, cord, chain
[line]

post.title: lili
post.body:
**mod** small, little, young, a bit, short, few, less
**vt** reduce, shorten, shrink, lessen

post.title: li
post.body: **sep** (between any subject except mi and sina and its verb; also used to introduce a new verb for the same subject)

post.title: lete
post.body:
**n** cold
**mod** cold, uncooked
**vt** cool down, chill

post.title: len
post.body: **n** clothing, cloth, fabric

post.title: lawa
post.body:
**n** head, mind
**mod** main, leading, in charge
**vt** lead, control, rule, steer

post.title: laso
post.body: **mod** blue, blue-green

post.title: lape
post.body:
**n** vi sleep, rest
**mod** sleeping, of sleep

post.title: la
post.body: **sep** (between adverb or phrase of context and sentence)

post.title: kute
post.body:
**vt** listen, hear
**mod** auditory, hearing
[_fr_ Ã©couter]

post.title: kule
post.body:
**n** colour, paint
**mod** colourful
**vt** colour, paint

post.title: kon
post.body:
**n** air, wind, smell, soul
**mod** air-like, ethereal, gaseous

post.title: ko
post.body: **n** semi-solid or squishy substance, e.g. paste, powder, gum

post.title: kiwen
post.body:
**mod** hard, solid, stone-like, made of stone or metal
**n** hard thing, rock, stone, metal, mineral, clay

post.title: kipisi
post.body:
**n** knife, cut
**vt** to cut

post.title: kin
post.body: **mod** also, too, even, indeed (emphasizes the word(s) before it)

post.title: kili
post.body: **n** fruit, pulpy vegetable, mushroom

post.title: kepeken
post.body:
**vt** use
**prep** with

post.title: ken
post.body:
**vi** can, is able to, is allowed to, may, is possible
**n** possibility, ability, power to do things, permission
**vt** make possible, enable, allow, permit
**cont** it is possible that
[can]

post.title: kasi
post.body: **n** plant, leaf, herb, tree, wood

post.title: kama
post.body:
**vi** come, become, arrive, happen, pursue actions to arrive to (a certain state), manage to, start to
**n** event, happening, chance, arrival, beginning
**mod** coming, future
**vt** bring about, summon
[come up]

post.title: kalama
post.body:
**n** sound, noise, voice
**vi** make noise
**vt** sound, ring, play (an instrument)

post.title: kala
post.body: **n** fish, sea creature

post.title: jo
post.body:
**vt** have, contain
**n** having

post.title: jelo
post.body:
**mod** yellow, light green
[yellow]

post.title: jan
post.body:
**n** person, people, human, being, somebody, anybody
**mod** human, somebody's, personal, of people
**vt** personify, humanize, personalize

post.title: jaki
post.body:
**mod** dirty, gross, filthy
**n** dirt, pollution, garbage, filth
**vt** pollute, dirty
**interj** ew! yuck!
[yucky]

post.title: insa
post.body:
**n** inside, inner world, centre, stomach
**mod** inner, internal
[inside]

post.title: ilo
post.body: **n** tool, device, machine, thing used for a specific purpose

post.title: ike
post.body:
**mod** bad, negative, wrong, evil, overly complex, (figuratively) unhealthy
**interj** oh dear! woe! alas!
**n** negativity, badness, evil
**vt** to make bad, to worsen, to have a negative effect upon
**vi** to be bad, to suck
[sounds like icky]

post.title: ijo
post.body:
**n** thing, something, stuff, anything, object
**mod** of something
**vt** objectify

post.title: esun
post.body: **n** market, shop

post.title: en
post.body: **conj** and (used to coordinate head nouns)

post.title: e
post.body: **sep** (introduces a direct object)

post.title: awen
post.body:
**vi** stay, wait, remain
**vt** keep
**mod** remaining, stationary, permanent, sedentary

post.title: anu
post.body: **conj** or

post.title: ante
post.body:
**n** difference
**mod** different
**conj** otherwise, or else
**vt** change, alter, modify

post.title: anpa
post.body:
**n** bottom, lower part, under, below, floor, beneath
**mod** low, lower, bottom, down

post.title: ale, ali
post.body:
**n** everything, anything, life, the universe
**mod** all, every, complete, whole

post.title: alasa
post.body: **vt** gather, hunt

post.title: ala
post.body:
**mod** no, not, none, un-
**n** nothing, negation, zero
**interj** no!

post.title: akesi

post.title: lape
post.body:
**n**, **vi** sleep, rest
**mod** sleeping, of sleep

post.title: la
post.body: separator (between adverb or phrase of context and sentence)

post.title: kute
post.body:
**vt** listen, hear
**mod** auditory, hearing

post.title: kulupu
post.body:
**n** group, community, society, company, people
**mod** communal, shared, public, of the society
[club]

post.title: kule
post.body:
**n** colour, paint
**mod** colourful
**vt** colour, paint

post.title: kon
post.body:
**n** air, wind, smell, soul
**mod** air-like, ethereal, gaseous

post.title: ko
post.body: **n** semi-solid or squishy substance, e.g. paste, powder, gum

post.title: kiwen
post.body:
**mod** hard, solid, stone-like, made of stone or metal
**n** hard thing, rock, stone, metal, mineral, clay

post.title: kipisi
post.body:
**n** knife, cut
**vt** to cut

post.title: kin
post.body: **mod** also, too, even, indeed (emphasizes the word(s) before it)

post.title: kili
post.body: **n** fruit, pulpy vegetable, mushroom

post.title: kepeken
post.body:
**vt** use
**prep** with

post.title: ken
post.body:
**vi** can, is able to, is allowed to, may, is possible
**n** possibility, ability, power to do things, permission
**vt** make possible, enable, allow, permit
**cont** it is possible that

post.title: kasi
post.body: **n** plant, leaf, herb, tree, wood

post.title: kama
post.body:
**vi** come, become, arrive, happen, pursue actions to arrive to (a certain state), manage to, start to
**n** event, happening, chance, arrival, beginning
**mod** coming, future
**vt** bring about, summon
[come up]

post.title: kalama
post.body:
**n** sound, noise, voice
**vi** make noise
**vt** sound, ring, play (an instrument)

post.title: kala
post.body: **n** fish, sea creature

post.title: jo
post.body:
**vt** have, contain
**n** having
**kama** receive, get, take, obtain

post.title: jelo
post.body:
**mod** yellow, light green
[yellow]

post.title: jan
post.body:
**n** person, people, human, being, somebody, anybody
**mod** human, somebody's, personal, of people
**vt** personify, humanize, personalize
